thread.title: Person stabbed near Jackson Square MBTA station - News
thread.title_full: Person stabbed near Jackson Square MBTA station - News

author: boston.com
title: Person stabbed near Jackson Square MBTA station - News
text:
A person was stabbed at about 3:20 p.m. Thursday near the Jackson Square MBTA Station in Jamaica Plain, according to Boston police.
Police said the person suffered life-threatening injuries.
The Orange Line station is closed, and a shuttle service will be provided between Stony Brook and Roxbury Crossing, according to the MBTA .
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below #MBTA #OrangeLine Jackson station is closed due to police action. Service will bypass Jackson in both directions. https://t.co/sSacwgTPxn
